Performer:
Nozawa Kin'ya (see also Nozawa Kinshi V) (野澤錦弥)

Alternate Name: Nozawa Kinshi V (野澤錦糸 (五))

Dates: '1978-1998/04'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
